H0.text: what kind of government does brazil has. Parliamentary Democracy

H1.text: what kind of government does brazil has. Constitutional Monarchy

H2.text: what kind of government does brazil has. Presidential System

H3.text: what kind of government does brazil has. Federal republic

A4.text: Brazil is a federal presidential constitutional republic, which is based on a representative democracy.

A5.text: The Federal Constitution is the supreme law of Brazil. It is the foundation and source of the legal authority underlying the existence of Brazil and the federal government.
